tldr: The `async-std` crate is no longer maintained, as indicated by the developer. Its last commit documents that `async-std` has served its purpose and will no longer receive updates.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `async-std` package from your application. Please take a look at smol instead.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
